text:
The food standard stayed pretty much the same after these years. Pretty good.

The counter staff were nice to advice against not having ice in the bandung as its too sweet. üëç

When the food was ready, our buzzer did not go off. Believe due to low battery. One of the younger staff came over to find our buzzer. I have pet peeve of eating food that was left cold, and I snapped at him a little.

I'm sorry young bro, its my bad. You were kind enough to come find us. üòû

The food was still a little warm, thankfully. Alls still good.

Would visit again!

The food is amazing here but the staff team is even better! So helpful and extremely nice to us. The food was delicious and chickens were tender! We were very happy to break our fast here. Definitely recommend everyone to come! üòçüëç

Cosy place for dining in, great tasting with most dishes not too salty, we asked for super spicy on some of our dishes and those came spot on.

We will visit again, desserts were great too.

Parking space, abundant.

Short waiting time. One of the best tasting Tenderbest out there.

I was amazed by this restaurant. My first time visiting. My husband insist bringing me here on Christmas lunch with kids. Saying this restaurant is very quiet and nice. I was thinking, "U sure?" But..... I went from "are you sure" to "thanks for bringing me here". I even ordered the 2nd round. üòÇ The food is nice, the staff is friendly, the environment is cool and the Renovation and Christmas decor is awesome. I'll definitely be back again and again.
We're very impressed by the juicy crispy chicken! Great for the family, great for the budget, the outside area is nice to chill at with a little pond for the kids to look at in between bites.
